I wasn’t able to access the actual invoice file that was emailed (the email contents are protected), and the shopping system only confirms that the invoice was sent to your inbox—it doesn’t provide a downloadable file directly.

Right now, in `/user/invoices` you only have:
- `Invoice_ORDER-010235.txt`
- `Invoice_ORDER-067926.txt`

There’s no invoice yet for `ORDER-104674` (Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T‑Shirt, ordered 2024-04-18).

To get the invoice saved into `/user`, you’ll need to:
1. Download the invoice attachment from your email manually (from the message relating to `ORDER-104674`).
2. Save or move that file into `/user` (or `/user/invoices`) on this system.

If you can provide either:
- The download URL of the invoice file, or  
- The attachment ID (if visible in your mail system),

I can then download it for you and place it into `/user` automatically.
